nodes.text: The Lasan High Honor Guard, also known simply as the Lasan Honor Guard, was a military group on the Lasat homeworld of Lasan. The group was tasked with protecting the Lasan Royal family. The Galactic Empire defeated the Honor Guard during its pacification of Lasan, in which nearly all of the Lasat on Lasan were brutally wiped out. Garazeb "Zeb" Orrelios was a former Captain of the Honor Guard of Lasan.

Agent Alexsandr Kallus of the Imperial Security Bureau participated in the destruction of Lasan, defeating a Lasat Honor Guard in battle and taking the fallen warrior's J-19 bo-rifle—the Honor Guard's traditional weapon—not as a trophy, but because the honorably conquered Lasat gave it to him in correspondence with the Lasan warrior's way: "When one is defeated by a superior foe, he gifts his weapon." Zeb Orrelios also wielded a bo-rifle in his post-Honor Guard days.
